mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gc_tbl_board (board_no, title, user_no, content) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL,#{title},#{user_no},#{content})
mapper.select: SELECT board_no, title, content, user_no, reg FROM ( SELECT board_no, title, content, user_no, reg, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY board_no DESC) AS RNUM FROM gc_tbl_board ) MP WHERE RNUM between #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY board_no DESC
SELECT COUNT(board_no) FROM gc_tbl_board WHERE board_no > 0
SELECT board_no , title , content , user_no , reg FROM gc_tbl_board WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
